mapper.select: select role_flow, role_code, role_name from sys_role where delete_flag = 'N' and exists( select null from sys_user_role where sys_user_role.delete_flag = 'N' and sys_user_role.role_flow = sys_role.role_flow and sys_user_role.user_flow = #{userFlow} )

select res_flow, res_name, res_path, res_method from sys_resource where delete_flag = 'N' and exists( select null from sys_user_role, sys_role_resource where sys_user_role.delete_flag = 'N' and sys_role_resource.delete_flag = 'N' and sys_user_role.role_flow = sys_role_resource.role_flow and sys_resource.res_flow = sys_role_resource.res_flow and sys_user_role.user_flow = #{userFlow} )
